attributes.action: remove VAT on council garage rents for homeowners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: VAT is charged to council garage rent if the tenant is a home owner, but not if they are council house tenants as well. This is an iniquitous tax imposed by the EU but which despite all the rhetoric from our government that they govern this country they are unwilling to remove.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
